metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVES We report three cases of bladder hemangioma. METHODS Three cases of cavernous hemangioma of the bladder with pathologic confirmation treated by endoscopical resection. RESULTS There is no evidence of recurrence in either patient after resection. CONCLUSIONS The endoscopical treatment of small bladder hemangiomas is an effective treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Resección endoscópica como tratamiento del hemangioma cavernoso de vejiga.
[Treatment of a cavernous hemangioma of the bladder by endoscopical resection].
